instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building Arthvyay. Use the provided colors and fonts strictly. Do not revert to default Shadcn styles. Every page must feel 'directed' and intentional.
instructions_to_main_agent.landing_page: Use the 'Tetris Grid'. The Hero section should use the 'Young professional' image with a 'Tracing Beam' effect on the CTA. Use the 'Abstract chart' image as a subtle background texture for the Features section.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Use the 'Control Room Grid'. The 'Financial Health Score' must be the dominant visual element (Hero Card). Use Recharts for P&L and Balance Sheet visualizations, styling them with the brand palette (Blue for assets/profit, Orange for liabilities/loss).
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile: Ensure all grids collapse to single columns on mobile. Touch targets must be at least 44px. Use a bottom navigation bar for the mobile app view.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Customize Tooltips to be dark with white text (glassmorphism). Use gradients in AreaCharts (fade from brand color to transparent).
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1. Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
